content: discover the joy of crocheting with this quick and easy crochet seed stitch scarf pattern perfect for beginners you ll be amazed how the simple combination of single_crochet and chain stitches results in a fabulous scarf add a multi-colored yarn cake into the mix and voila you have a unique cozy accessory crafted by you i ve included instructions to allow you to make a project to your own custom size using any yarn and hook combo you d like you can find this extra information in my blog post if you want to change yarn colors it is recommended that you do so on the last yarn over of the last single_crochet of the row you can either carry the yarn up the side edge or finish off and weave those yarn ends in or leave them as a fringe along the 2 edges of the scarf next week s matching hat pattern uses the rest of the cake of yarn first scarf of the month club cal pattern for 2024 join the cal newsletter here https //oombawkadesigncrochet ck page/0fde95d68d 1 a photo and
